value.name: EXCLUSIVE: Local school official accused of selling district iPads out of his truck
value.description: Juliette says early on the police chief told her they'd identified ten iPads sold by Nester, but the district hasn't released how many devices total are missing. Superintendent Eduardo Hernandez has so far declined our request for an interview.
